payload: Merge loop sleek-sparrow from branch ralph/sleek-sparrow

root_cause: POST /api/pipelines reads tenantId exclusively from request.user.tenantId (JWT). Superadmins have null tenantId so get 400 error. Frontend upload() and PipelinesPage never send effectiveTenantId to the backend. failing_test: packages/api/src/routes/pipelines.test.ts repro_steps: 1. Login as superadmin (tenantId=null) 2. Navigate to Pipelines page 3. Select a tenant from the dropdown 4. Upload a PDF or enter a URL 5. Click Start Pipeline 6. Observe 400 error: User must belong to a tenant
